title: Deep eutectic solvent-assisted dual valorization of waste distillers' grain-derived lignocellulose: pyrolyzed hydrochar microflower-supported peroxymonosulfate activation and lignin carbon dot-aided Fe3+ detection
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00407H, Paper
Cheng Huang, Yunbo Zhai, Xiangmin Liu, Xiaoping Liu, Zhexian Wang, Yin Zhou, Hanzhuo Luo, Deyu Qin, Chen Zhang
A tailored engineering approach assisted by recyclable deep eutectic solvent fractionation was presented for the dual valorization of waste lignocellulose.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
